name: Work in Progress
wiql: [System.Id],[System.WorkItemType],[System.Title], [System.AssignedTo],[System.State],[Microsoft.VSTS.Scheduling.RemainingWork] FROM workitems WHERE [System.TeamProject] = @project     AND [System.IterationPath] UNDER 'smh360_scrum\Sprint 2' AND [System.WorkItemType] IN GROUP 'Microsoft.TaskCategory'     AND [System.State] = 'In Progress' ORDER BY [System.AssignedTo],[Microsoft.VSTS.Common.BacklogPriority],[System.Id]
